ai.summary: Drake Walk is a short, easy 2.8 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route follows gentle, well-maintained paths with minimal elevation, offering a relaxed outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently rolling terrain along well-kept footpaths and grassy verges. Expect some sections to be uneven or muddy after rain; footwear with good grip is recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Even on an easy trail, monitor weather conditions and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on marked paths, bring water, and carry a simple map or GPS device. In wet or windy conditions, surfaces can be slippery; take your time and avoid steep or uneven sections.
recommended_gear: Fully charged phone with emergency contact information
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) offer the best conditions in the UK, with milder weather and longer daylight. The walk is still doable in winter with appropriate footwear and layers.

seo.title: Drake Walk: Easy 2.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Drake Walk, an easy 2.8 km hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety, best seasons, and gear for a relaxed outdoor outing.
